docblock.description: Creates breadcrumbs, according to the Bootstrap component
Add a crumb to the end of the trail

tag.name: param
tag.description:
If provided as a string, it represents the title of the crumb. Alternatively you can provide an array, with each values being a single crumb. Arrays are expected to be of this form:

  • title The title of the crumb
  • link The link of the crumb
  • options Options of the crumb

tag.name: param
tag.description: URL of the crumb. Either a string, an array of route params to pass to Url::build() or null/empty

tag.name: param
tag.description:
Array of options. These options will be used as attributes HTML attribute the crumb will be rendered in (a

  • tag by default). It accepts two special keys:

    • innerAttrs: An array that allows you to define attributes for the inner element of the crumb (by default, to the link)
    • templateVars: Specific template vars in case you override the templates provided

docblock.description: Prepend a crumb to the start of the queue

tag.name: param
tag.description:
If provided as a string, it represents the title of the crumb. Alternatively you can provide an array, with each values being a single crumb. Arrays are expected to be of this form:

  • title The title of the crumb
  • link The link of the crumb
  • options Options of the crumb

tag.name: param
tag.description: URL of the crumb. Either a string, an array of route params to pass to Url::build() or null/empty

tag.name: param
tag.description:
Array of options. These options will be used as attributes HTML attribute the crumb will be rendered in (a

  • tag by default). It accepts two special keys:

    • innerAttrs: An array that allows you to define attributes for the inner element of the crumb (by default, to the link)
    • templateVars: Specific template vars in case you override the templates provided

tag.name: param
tag.description: Array of attributes applied to the wrapper template

docblock.description: Provides a way to set one-time notification messages to be displayed after processing a form or acknowledging data.
docblock.long-description: This class allows the `alert()`, `error()`, `notice()` and `success()` methods are automatically handled by the plugin and rendered dynamically using the `src/Template/Element/Flash/flash.ctp` template.

docblock.description: Internal method to build a value

docblock.long-description: You can also pass an array with the keys and values as the only argument.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Key or array with keys and values

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.long-description:
If the existing value and the value to append are both strings, the strings will be concatenated. In any other cases, an array of elements will be created.
You can also pass an array with the keys and values as the only argument.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Key or array with keys and values

docblock.description: Used to read and delete a value from a key
Checks if a key contains a value.
docblock.long-description:
If the existing value is an array: - if you pass an array, the elements of the two arrays will be compared; - otherwise, it will be checked if the value you have passed is contained in the array.
In all other cases, the value you have passed and your existing value will be compared.

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance

docblock.description: Gets the value for a key

docblock.long-description: Gets `tooltip` and `tooltip-align` keys and builds `data-tootle` and `data-placement` keys, as required by Bootstrap tooltips.

tag.name: fluent
tag.description: This method is part of a fluent interface and will return the same instance
